body:
Hee Chris,



Solution for you might be simple: The distance from the Shading to the glass has to be bigger than 1/2 the size of the shading element. Elsewise the shading element goes through you window and Honeybee does'nt like that.



I see you have a shading element of 0.05 (0.025 in both direction from centreline shading) and a distance of 0.02 which means the shading element would pas through the window by 0.005. This solved my problems once before.



Maybe you can have a look at my question?
